title: Changing Into Swimsuits
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Karin-saaan, are you done changing~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, thanks for waiting. Sorry that it took me a while to change.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No, it’s all okay. But with that said....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>? Is there something weird about me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Well, I thought about it, but you look even sexier in a swimsuit than I imagined, Karin-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thank you. Fufu, you can take a closer look if you want, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>N-, no, I’ll pass! It’s making my heart beat fast enough already at this distance!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Y-, you see, one-shoulder swimsuits only have shoulder straps on one side, so it’s really showing a lot of skin.... And since your skin is so glossy, it’s like my eyes are naturally drawn to you or something....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ufufufu, I’m happy to hear that much praise from you. Hey, just for you, You-chan, I’ll let you touch・my・skin♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Uwaaah! G-, geez, Karin-san, don’t tease me like that~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
